subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Rao Jodha in Jaipur?
question_hi: राजस्थान के लोकल फोट राव जोध (राव जोध) ने जयपुर में कैलेपार की शुरुआत कैलेपार के नाम की गई थी।

options.option_explanation_en: Amber Fort is a famous fort located in Jaipur and was constructed by Rao Jodha.
options.option_explanation_hi: आमेर फोट एक जयपुर में पैलिस्ट को बनाया गया था जो राव जोध (राव जोध) ने बना था।

options.option_explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous palace in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Sawai Pratap Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: हाउवा महाल एक जयपुर में फर्स्ट वेल का बना जीते है।

options.option_explanation_en: City Palace is a historical building complex located in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Man Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: मैंट पेल एक भवन कंटिया को महाराजा मान सिंग ने बना है।

options.option_explanation_en: Jal Mahal is a palace located in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Ram Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: जल माहाल एक जयपुर में संग्राज राम सिंग ने बना है।

options.option_explanation_en: Gaitor is a historic structure located in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: गायटर एक जयपुर में सवाई जैयांग ने बना है।

options.option_explanation_en: Hawa Mahal is a famous structure located in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Sawai Mansingh.
options.option_explanation_hi: हावा माहाल एक जयपुर में सवाई मांसिंग ने बना है।

options.option_explanation_en: Chand Baoli is a step well located in Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Jai Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: चंद बाउली एक बेली में सवाई यांग ने बना है।

options.option_explanation_en: Amber Fort is a historical fort located near Jaipur and was built by Maharaja Ram Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: अमेर फोट एक बेली में सवाई यांग ने बना है।

options.option_explanation_en: Pushkar Lake is a holy lake located in Rajasthan and was built during the reign of Maharaja Jaisa Singh.
options.option_explanation_hi: पुषकर लैकर एलकर मेंर मेंर यालैकर

options.option_explanation_en: Ranthambh Fort is a historical fort located in Ajmer district and was built during the Mughal dynasty.
